objects.text:
• Digital LED Display
• Multiple Wash Cycles
• Energy-Efficient Design
• Smart Function Selection

product_details.name: Insignia Smart Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Innovation
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with Clear Time Indicator
• Multiple Wash Cycles with Express and Delay Options
• Premium Large Capacity Drum Design
• User-Friendly Control Panel with Intuitive Dial Selection
• Energy-Efficient Performance
• Sleek White Design with Modern Black Glass Door
• Advanced Temperature Control Settings
• Multiple Spin Speed Options
• Customizable Wash Programs for Different Fabrics
• Easy-Access Front Loading Design
• Compact Yet Spacious Interior
• Anti-Vibration System with Stabilizing Feet
• Clear View Door Window for Load Monitoring
• Smart Function Selection for Specialized Washing Needs

banner_details:
This banner presents a modern promotional layout for a smart washing machine. The top-left quadrant features bold and futuristic typography in white for the primary message (text layers: `heading_1` and `heading_2`), positioned over a blue grid background that implies technological innovation. Below this, the subheadings (`subheading_1`, `subheading_2`) emphasize ease and intelligence in laundry solutions. The product brand and name (`product_name`) and a sleek tagline (`tagline`) are centered, enhancing brand identity. The right side displays a prominent image of the washer (`product_image`). The bottom-left segment uses a muted grey background to highlight features in a bullet list (`description`), followed by a prominently styled price tag (`price`) and a high-contrast call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Royal Blue: `#2B5EDF`
- Soft Sky Blue: `#72A1FF`
- Light Gray: `#E0E0E0`
- Bright White: `#FFFFFF`
- Charcoal Gray: `#333333`
- Cyan Accent: `#00C2CB`
product_color: The product image features a modern washing machine with a sleek, minimalist design accentuated by a clean and sophisticated monochrome color palette. The primary color is a crisp white (#FFFFFF), which dominates the body and conveys cleanliness and purity. The control panel and inner drum detailing incorporate deep black (#000000), adding contrast and emphasizing structure. The dial features metallic silver (#C0C0C0) for a high-tech feel, and the digital display glows with electric blue (#00BFFF), highlighting functionality and modernity. These colors are expertly blended by maintaining high contrast and sharp edges, making each feature distinct while complementing the overall clean aesthetic.
